00016         template <typename genType>
00017         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool intersectRayPlane
00018         (
00019                 genType const & orig, genType const & dir,
00020                 genType const & planeOrig, genType const & planeNormal,
00021                 typename genType::value_type & intersectionDistance
00022         )
00023         {
00024                 typename genType::value_type d = glm::dot(dir, planeNormal);
00025                 typename genType::value_type Epsilon = std::numeric_limits<typename genType::value_type>::epsilon();
00026 
00027                 if(d < Epsilon)
00028                 {
00029                         intersectionDistance = glm::dot(planeOrig - orig, planeNormal) / d;
00030                         return true;
00031                 }
00032 
00033                 return false;
00034         }
00035 
00036         template <typename genType>
00037         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool intersectRayTriangle
00038         (
00039                 genType const & orig, genType const & dir,
00040                 genType const & v0, genType const & v1, genType const & v2,
00041                 genType & baryPosition
00042         )
00043         {
00044                 genType e1 = v1 - v0;
00045                 genType e2 = v2 - v0;
00046 
00047                 genType p = glm::cross(dir, e2);
00048 
00049                 typename genType::value_type a = glm::dot(e1, p);
00050 
00051                 typename genType::value_type Epsilon = std::numeric_limits<typename genType::value_type>::epsilon();
00052                 if(a < Epsilon)
00053                         return false;
00054 
00055                 typename genType::value_type f = typename genType::value_type(1.0f) / a;
00056 
00057                 genType s = orig - v0;
00058                 baryPosition.x = f * glm::dot(s, p);
00059                 if(baryPosition.x < typename genType::value_type(0.0f))
00060                         return false;
00061                 if(baryPosition.x > typename genType::value_type(1.0f))
00062                         return false;
00063 
00064                 genType q = glm::cross(s, e1);
00065                 baryPosition.y = f * glm::dot(dir, q);
00066                 if(baryPosition.y < typename genType::value_type(0.0f))
00067                         return false;
00068                 if(baryPosition.y + baryPosition.x > typename genType::value_type(1.0f))
00069                         return false;
00070 
00071                 baryPosition.z = f * glm::dot(e2, q);
00072 
00073                 return baryPosition.z >= typename genType::value_type(0.0f);
00074         }

00113         template <typename genType>
00114         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool intersectLineTriangle
00115         (
00116                 genType const & orig, genType const & dir,
00117                 genType const & vert0, genType const & vert1, genType const & vert2,
00118                 genType & position
00119         )
00120         {
00121                 typename genType::value_type Epsilon = std::numeric_limits<typename genType::value_type>::epsilon();
00122 
00123                 genType edge1 = vert1 - vert0;
00124                 genType edge2 = vert2 - vert0;
00125 
00126                 genType pvec = cross(dir, edge2);
00127 
00128                 float det = dot(edge1, pvec);
00129 
00130                 if (det > -Epsilon && det < Epsilon)
00131                         return false;
00132                 float inv_det = typename genType::value_type(1) / det;
00133 
00134                 genType tvec = orig - vert0;
00135 
00136                 position.y = dot(tvec, pvec) * inv_det;
00137                 if (position.y < typename genType::value_type(0) || position.y > typename genType::value_type(1))
00138                         return false;
00139 
00140                 genType qvec = cross(tvec, edge1);
00141 
00142                 position.z = dot(dir, qvec) * inv_det;
00143                 if (position.z < typename genType::value_type(0) || position.y + position.z > typename genType::value_type(1))
00144                         return false;
00145 
00146                 position.x = dot(edge2, qvec) * inv_det;
00147 
00148                 return true;
00149         }

00151         template <typename genType>
00152         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool intersectRaySphere
00153         (
00154                 genType const & rayStarting, genType const & rayNormalizedDirection,
00155                 genType const & sphereCenter, const typename genType::value_type sphereRadiusSquered,
00156                 typename genType::value_type & intersectionDistance
00157         )
00158         {
00159                 typename genType::value_type Epsilon = std::numeric_limits<typename genType::value_type>::epsilon();
00160                 genType diff = sphereCenter - rayStarting;
00161                 typename genType::value_type t0 = dot(diff, rayNormalizedDirection);
00162                 typename genType::value_type dSquared = dot(diff, diff) - t0 * t0;
00163                 if( dSquared > sphereRadiusSquered )
00164                 {
00165                         return false;
00166                 }
00167                 typename genType::value_type t1 = sqrt( sphereRadiusSquered - dSquared );
00168                 intersectionDistance = t0 > t1 + Epsilon ? t0 - t1 : t0 + t1;
00169                 return intersectionDistance > Epsilon;
00170         }
00171 
00172         template <typename genType>
00173         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool intersectRaySphere
00174         (
00175                 genType const & rayStarting, genType const & rayNormalizedDirection,
00176                 genType const & sphereCenter, const typename genType::value_type sphereRadius,
00177                 genType & intersectionPosition, genType & intersectionNormal
00178         )
00179         {
00180                 typename genType::value_type distance;
00181                 if( intersectRaySphere( rayStarting, rayNormalizedDirection, sphereCenter, sphereRadius * sphereRadius, distance ) )
00182                 {
00183                         intersectionPosition = rayStarting + rayNormalizedDirection * distance;
00184                         intersectionNormal = (intersectionPosition - sphereCenter) / sphereRadius;
00185                         return true;
00186                 }
00187                 return false;
00188         }
00189 
00190         template <typename genType>
00191         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER bool intersectLineSphere
00192         (
00193                 genType const & point0, genType const & point1,
00194                 genType const & sphereCenter, typename genType::value_type sphereRadius,
00195                 genType & intersectionPoint1, genType & intersectionNormal1, 
00196                 genType & intersectionPoint2, genType & intersectionNormal2
00197         )
00198         {
00199                 typename genType::value_type Epsilon = std::numeric_limits<typename genType::value_type>::epsilon();
00200                 genType dir = normalize(point1 - point0);
00201                 genType diff = sphereCenter - point0;
00202                 typename genType::value_type t0 = dot(diff, dir);
00203                 typename genType::value_type dSquared = dot(diff, diff) - t0 * t0;
00204                 if( dSquared > sphereRadius * sphereRadius )
00205                 {
00206                         return false;
00207                 }
00208                 typename genType::value_type t1 = sqrt( sphereRadius * sphereRadius - dSquared );
00209                 if( t0 < t1 + Epsilon )
00210                         t1 = -t1;
00211                 intersectionPoint1 = point0 + dir * (t0 - t1);
00212                 intersectionNormal1 = (intersectionPoint1 - sphereCenter) / sphereRadius;
00213                 intersectionPoint2 = point0 + dir * (t0 + t1);
00214                 intersectionNormal2 = (intersectionPoint2 - sphereCenter) / sphereRadius;
00215                 return true;
00216         }
00217 }//namespace glm
